result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael C Snipes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Dodge Correctional Institution as reception facility. 
Defendant is eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.  
Defendant is eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program.

05/18/2016 AMENDED TO REDUCE SENTENCE CREDIT FROM 139 DAYS TO 124 DAYS CREDIT.

superMiscConds.notes: If probation or extended supervision is allowed to expire or is revoked with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge and provide current financial information.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for any balances due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.  Attorney Fees To Be Determined.  Probation does NOT collect attorney fees.
Must complete any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by Probation Agent. Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge.

superTimeConds.notes: Court orders 100 hours per year of Community Service while on extended supervision or probation.
02/06/18 AMENDED:  COURT ORDERS DEFENDANT TO SERVE 45 DAYS IN THE BARRON COUNTY JAIL EFFECTIVE 02/01/18.

THIS COVERS 15CF163 & 15CF544  
PSI discussed. Corrections noted. State makes recommendation and Argument. Argument by Defense. Defendant address the court. 

15CF544 - Prison 3 Years 6 Months
1 year 6 months initial confinement - 139 days credit. 
Defendant is eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.

Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge. 
Costs

15CF163 - 
SW - 5 years probation concurrent to 15CF544.
